[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ module_class=”show-bg-tablet-mobile-300h” _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”default” background_image=”https://tintyoga.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/07/on-demand.png” background_last_edited=”on|tablet” background_image_tablet=”https://tintyoga.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/08/on-demand_mobile.png” background_enable_image_tablet=”on” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_css_main_element_last_edited=”on|tablet”][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”2_3,1_3″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” disabled_on=”on|on|on” _builder_version=”4.14.9″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#F5F5F6″ custom_margin=”||50px||false|false” custom_padding=”0px|0px|0px|50px|true|false” custom_padding_tablet=”0px|0px|0px|0px|true|true” custom_padding_phone=”” custom_css_main_element=”display:flex;||flex-wrap:wrap;” border_radii=”on|20px|20px|20px|20px” disabled=”on” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”2_3″ _builder_version=”4.8.1″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”50px||50px||true|false” custom_padding_tablet=”50px|50px|50px|50px|true|true” custom_padding_phone=”|25px||25px|true|true” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” custom_css_main_element=”order:1;” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_css_main_element_last_edited=”off|desktop”][dsm_text_badges main_text=”Monthly Focus Topics” badges_background_color=”rgba(92,181,15,0.1)” badges_gap=”10px” _builder_version=”4.8.1″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”|700|||||||” header_font_size=”22px” badges_text_color=”#5CB50F” border_radii_image=”on|5px|5px|5px|5px” border_width_all_image=”1px” border_color_all_image=”#5CB50F” global_colors_info=”{}”][/dsm_text_badges][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.8.1″ _module_preset=”22fe5eac-fadd-4b7a-9a95-0f3dc803dfea” text_text_color=”RGBA(0,0,0,0.3)” text_font_size=”20px” text_line_height=”40px” global_colors_info=”{}”]Focus is essential to grow and evolve. We focus on a specific topic for one month during our weekly live sessions. This way, you have the opportunity to work an entire month on one dedicated goal.[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ module_class=”show-bg-tablet-mobile-300h” _builder_version=”4.8.1″ _module_preset=”default” background_image=”https://tintyoga.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/07/monthly-focus-topic.png” background_last_edited=”on|tablet” background_image_tablet=”https://tintyoga.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/08/live-topic_mobile.png” background_enable_image_tablet=”on” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”2_3,1_3″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” _builder_version=”4.8.1″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#F5F5F6″ custom_margin=”||100px||false|false” custom_padding=”0px|0px|0px|0px|true|false” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”0px|0px|0px||true|false” custom_css_main_element=”display:flex;||flex-wrap:wrap;” border_radii=”on|20px|20px|20px|20px” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”2_3″ _builder_version=”4.8.1″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”50px|50px|50px|50px|true|true” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”|25px||25px|true|true” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_css_main_element=”order:1;” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.14.9″ _module_preset=”22fe5eac-fadd-4b7a-9a95-0f3dc803dfea” header_3_font_size=”22px” custom_margin=”||20px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Special Events

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.14.9″ _module_preset=”22fe5eac-fadd-4b7a-9a95-0f3dc803dfea” text_text_color=”RGBA(0,0,0,0.3)” text_font_size=”20px” text_line_height=”40px” global_colors_info=”{}”]

We organize online events to interact with our community, connect people and celebrate their achievements. This can be a themed mini-retreat or a dedicated workshop – emotions and lasting memories guaranteed!

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ module_class=”show-bg-tablet-mobile-300h” _builder_version=”4.8.1″ _module_preset=”default” background_image=”https://tintyoga.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/07/quarterly-event.png” background_last_edited=”on|tablet” background_image_tablet=”https://tintyoga.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/08/quarterly-event_mobile.png” background_enable_image_tablet=”on” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row disabled_on=”off|off|off” _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”9bcc7576-915c-49d1-9d9b-dcdea1f86589″ custom_padding=”0px||125px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.8.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”22fe5eac-fadd-4b7a-9a95-0f3dc803dfea” header_3_font=”||||||||” header_3_text_align=”center” max_width=”650px” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”||20px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Not sure if the membership is right for you?

Call us.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_blurb use_icon=”on” font_icon=”||divi||400″ icon_color=”#276586″ icon_placement=”left” image_icon_width=”25px” module_class=”fab-phone duotone-uni” _builder_version=”4.14.4″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”|700|||||||” header_font_size=”16px” body_text_color=”#da7d78″ body_font_size=”25px” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”||20px||false|false” custom_padding=”15px|70px|15px|70px|true|true” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”15px|30px|15px|30px|true|true” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” animation=”off” link_option_url=”tel:+496967778512″ custom_css_main_element=”width:fit-content;||margin:auto;” custom_css_blurb_image=”margin-bottom:0px;||display: block;||width: fit-content;” custom_css_blurb_title=”padding:0px;||margin-bottom:-5px;||margin-top:5px;” custom_css_blurb_content=”display:flex;||align-items:center;||justify-content:center;” border_radii=”on|500px|500px|500px|500px” border_width_all=”1px” border_color_all=”rgba(0,0,0,0.1)” icon_font_size=”0px” global_module=”153900″ saved_tabs=”all” global_colors_info=”{}” border_color_all__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” border_color_all__hover=”#000000″ background__hover_enabled=”on|hover” background_color__hover=”RGBA(0,0,0,0)” background_enable_color__hover=”on” border_radii__hover_enabled=”on|hover” border_radii__hover=”on|10px|10px|10px|10px”]

+49 69 6777 8512

[/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.8.1″ _module_preset=”22fe5eac-fadd-4b7a-9a95-0f3dc803dfea” text_text_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0.3)” text_orientation=”center” global_module=”154873″ saved_tabs=”all” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Available Mo-Fr, 9am – 5pm (International phone numbers)

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.8.1″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”0px||100px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.8.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.10.6″ _module_preset=”22fe5eac-fadd-4b7a-9a95-0f3dc803dfea” custom_margin=”||10px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

No Trial, but Money-back.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.8.1″ _module_preset=”08f83bae-05d0-4028-b94b-bf929faf2837″ global_colors_info=”{}”]

True to our motto “There Is No Try” we don’t offer a testing period. We believe that if you want to become a better version of yourself you need to be 100% committed. Nevertheless, we guarantee a full refund with no questions asked within 30 days if you are not satisfied.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.8.1″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”0px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.8.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.10.6″ _module_preset=”22fe5eac-fadd-4b7a-9a95-0f3dc803dfea” custom_margin=”||10px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Payment Methods

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_4,1_4,1_4,1_4″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”2″ _builder_version=”4.8.1″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”0px||100px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.8.1″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#F5F5F6″ custom_padding=”50px||50px||true|false” border_radii=”on|10px|10px|10px|10px” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_code _builder_version=”4.8.1″ _module_preset=”default” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”||20px||false|false” custom_padding=”||0px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_code][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.8.1″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”RGBA(0,0,0,0.5)” text_font_size=”20px” text_orientation=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Mastercard

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.8.1″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#F5F5F6″ custom_padding=”50px||50px||true|false” border_radii=”on|10px|10px|10px|10px” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_code _builder_version=”4.8.1″ _module_preset=”default” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”||20px||false|false” custom_padding=”||0px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_code][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.8.1″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”RGBA(0,0,0,0.5)” text_font_size=”20px” text_orientation=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Visa

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.8.1″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#F5F5F6″ custom_padding=”50px||50px||true|false” border_radii=”on|10px|10px|10px|10px” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_code _builder_version=”4.8.1″ _module_preset=”default” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”||20px||false|false” custom_padding=”||0px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_code][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.8.1″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”RGBA(0,0,0,0.5)” text_font_size=”20px” text_orientation=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]

PayPal

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.8.1″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#F5F5F6″ custom_padding=”50px||50px||true|false” border_radii=”on|10px|10px|10px|10px” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_code _builder_version=”4.8.1″ _module_preset=”default” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”||20px||false|false” custom_padding=”||0px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_code][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.8.1″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”RGBA(0,0,0,0.5)” text_font_size=”20px” text_orientation=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Google Pay

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.8.1″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”0px||100px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.8.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.10.6″ _module_preset=”22fe5eac-fadd-4b7a-9a95-0f3dc803dfea” custom_margin=”||50px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Frequently Asked

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_accordion open_toggle_background_color=”rgba(218,125,120,0.1)” closed_toggle_background_color=”#F5F5F6″ icon_color=”#25252c” use_icon_font_size=”on” icon_font_size=”25px” module_class=”toggle-regular” _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”default” toggle_text_color=”#25252C” toggle_font=”|700|||||||” body_link_font=”||||on|||#25252C|” body_link_text_color=”RGBA(0,0,0,0.5)” custom_margin=”||||false|false” custom_padding=”30px||||false|false” custom_css_toggle=”padding:30px!important;” border_radii=”on|10px|10px|10px|10px” border_color_all=”#F5F5F6″ global_colors_info=”{}” border_color_all__hover_enabled=”on|hover” body_link_text_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” body_link_text_color__hover=”#25252C” border_color_all__hover=”#F5F5F6″][et_pb_accordion_item title=”Hidden” open=”on” _builder_version=”4.8.1″ _module_preset=”default” custom_css_main_element=”display:none” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Your content goes here. Edit or remove this text inline or in the module Content settings. You can also style every aspect of this content in the module Design settings and even apply custom CSS to this text in the module Advanced settings.

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”How does the 30-day guarantee work?” _builder_version=”4.8.1″ _module_preset=”default” border_width_all=”1px” border_color_all=”#f5f5f6″ icon_color__hover=”#da7d78″ icon_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” global_colors_info=”{}” closed_toggle_background_color__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” closed_toggle_background_color__hover=”rgba(218,125,120,0.1)” border_color_all__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” border_color_all__hover=”#da7d78″ open=”off”]Our goal is to make sure that you have the best learning and self-development experience possible. If TINT membership isn’t for you, then email us within 30 days of the date you purchase your subscription, and we’ll offer a full refund.[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”Is the membership renewed automatically?” _builder_version=”4.8.1″ _module_preset=”default” border_width_all=”1px” border_color_all=”#f5f5f6″ icon_color__hover=”#da7d78″ icon_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” global_colors_info=”{}” closed_toggle_background_color__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” closed_toggle_background_color__hover=”rgba(218,125,120,0.1)” border_color_all__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” border_color_all__hover=”#da7d78″ open=”off”]Yes, the membership is automatically renewed unless you cancel before the next membership period. For example, if you choose the 3-month membership, it is automatically renewed after 3 months for another 3 months.[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”How does cancelling the membership work?” _builder_version=”4.8.1″ _module_preset=”default” border_width_all=”1px” border_color_all=”#f5f5f6″ icon_color__hover=”#da7d78″ icon_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” global_colors_info=”{}” closed_toggle_background_color__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” closed_toggle_background_color__hover=”rgba(218,125,120,0.1)” border_color_all__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” border_color_all__hover=”#da7d78″ open=”off”]To cancel your membership, login to our website, select “Profile” and then “Billing”. In the section “Active Plans”, you will be able to change your plan or to cancel your membership.

A cancellation can be made anytime, but will only be valid from the next membership period on. You will have access to the platform until your current period ends. After that, your cancellation will be active and you will no longer have access to our premium contents.[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”When do I get billed?” _builder_version=”4.8.1″ _module_preset=”default” border_width_all=”1px” border_color_all=”#f5f5f6″ icon_color__hover=”#da7d78″ icon_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” global_colors_info=”{}” closed_toggle_background_color__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” closed_toggle_background_color__hover=”rgba(218,125,120,0.1)” border_color_all__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” border_color_all__hover=”#da7d78″ open=”off”]Depending on the membership type you choose, you get billed either quarterly, semi-annually or annually.[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”Which payment options do you offer?” _builder_version=”4.8.1″ _module_preset=”default” border_width_all=”1px” border_color_all=”#f5f5f6″ icon_color__hover=”#da7d78″ icon_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” global_colors_info=”{}” closed_toggle_background_color__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” closed_toggle_background_color__hover=”rgba(218,125,120,0.1)” border_color_all__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” border_color_all__hover=”#da7d78″ open=”off”]We accept various credit card payments (VISA, Mastercard) in addition to PayPal and GooglePay.[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”Where can I get help?” _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”default” border_width_all=”1px” border_color_all=”#f5f5f6″ icon_color__hover=”#da7d78″ icon_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” global_colors_info=”{}” closed_toggle_background_color__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” closed_toggle_background_color__hover=”rgba(218,125,120,0.1)” border_color_all__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” border_color_all__hover=”#da7d78″ open=”off”]

If you need help with anything, our help center offers you frequently asked questions on technical issues, account problems and payment questions.

Should you not find what you are looking for on this part of our website, you can always send us a message and we will get back to you as soon as possible, usually within 24 hours.

You can also call us via our international phone numbers. We’re alwas happy to hear from you.

You can find all contact options here.

[/et_pb_accordion_item][/et_pb_accordion][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.8.1″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”0px||||false|false” global_module=”154875″ saved_tabs=”all” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.8.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.10.6″ _module_preset=”22fe5eac-fadd-4b7a-9a95-0f3dc803dfea” custom_margin=”||50px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Reviews

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_code _builder_version=”4.10.6″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

[/et_pb_code][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.14.4″ _module_preset=”590b6581-18e7-40c5-849c-cd959c1d9a3f” global_module=”160574″ saved_tabs=”all” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row module_class=”inline-buttons” _builder_version=”4.14.4″ _module_preset=”default” custom_css_main_element=”text-align:center;” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.14.4″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://tintyoga.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/09/support_group.png” title_text=”support_group” align=”center” _builder_version=”4.14.4″ _module_preset=”default” width=”350px” width_tablet=”250px” width_phone=”” width_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.14.4″ _module_preset=”22fe5eac-fadd-4b7a-9a95-0f3dc803dfea” text_text_color=”#DA7D78″ text_font_size=”20px” header_2_text_align=”center” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”||25px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Schedule a Call

Open Questions?

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.14.4″ _module_preset=”22fe5eac-fadd-4b7a-9a95-0f3dc803dfea” text_font_size=”18px” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”||50px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]A representative from our team who already participated in this training is happy to talk to you.

Click on the button below and choose date and time for a 15 minute free call.[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”https://tintyoga.zohobookings.com/#/customer/membership” button_text=”Schedule a Free Call” _builder_version=”4.14.4″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”|15px|||false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”” custom_margin_phone=”|0px|||false|false” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_css_main_element_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_css_main_element_phone=”width:100%;”][/et_pb_button][et_pb_button button_url=”@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9saW5rX3VybF9wYWdlIiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsicG9zdF9pZCI6IjE1NDI5MiJ9fQ==@” button_text=”Other Contact Options” _builder_version=”4.14.4″ _dynamic_attributes=”button_url” _module_preset=”eede6e08-0069-422c-8cd8-be30fefdc145″ global_colors_info=”{}” custom_css_main_element_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_css_main_element_phone=”width:100%;”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]

Transparent prices for everyone.Subscription PricingWrite a message.Phone us.Save 50%12 Months$ 20 / Month$240 at once.
